name: OrganismsTestsByMicroscopicObservationByGiemsaWrightOrWright_GiemsaStain
title: Organisms (Tests by Microscopic Observation by Giemsa, Wright, or Wright_Giemsa Stain)
description: The value set is a combination of microscopic observations by Giemsa, Wright, or Wright_Giemsa Stain for organisms
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Organisms by microscopic observation),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: microscopic observation of organisms),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
